channel.title: Trained my guy yesterday now all stats are back to lvl 1
channel.description: Why does this happen? i created a new server and yesterday i trained my guy and now i logged on and i was back at the start

how do i edit it

and um like the day b4 i logged on and today i logged on with the same guy and all stats were back to lvl 1 and i was at the starting point why?
